evidence.claim: Chartis Clinical Quality Solutions utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure.
The company integrates with health data standards including FHIR and HL7 for interoperability.
Chartis focuses on leveraging X12 transaction sets in their health tech solutions.
The engineering team at Chartis has expertise in building scalable cloud-based solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare quality solutions and use of X12 standards indicates relevant use cases.
